subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: A time zone mix-up led to Rory McIlroy’s needing a police escort to make his tee time at Medinah Country Club, setting up a Sunday singles session for the ages.
snippet: A time zone mix-up led to Rory McIlroy’s needing a police escort to make his tee time at Medinah Country Club, setting up a Sunday singles session for the ages.
